column1: After the above action was dismissed, the 1st Respondent, the Officer of the Ministry
of Plantation  Industries who  had  been designated  the  Competent Authority for  the
purposes  of  the  Act,  had  served  the  Petitioner  with  a  Quit  Notice  dated  17th  June

column2: ‘X8’  to  hand  over  quiet  and  vacant  possession  of  the  above

column1: possessed by the Petitioner. Aggrieved by the decision to issue the said quit notice,
the Petitioner filed this application, seeking a Writ of Certiorari to quash ‘X8’.
